Detailed Description

Columns of calendar alerts information.

These fields are for tracking which alerts have been fired.Apps that receive this action may update the STATE for the reminder when they have finished handling it. Apps that have their notifications disabled should not modify the table to ensure that they do not conflict with another app that is generating a notification. In general, apps should not need to write to this table directly except to update the state of a reminder.

static const base::String gaia::content::CalendarReminders::Alerts::STATE ( ) [static]

The state of this alert.

It starts out as 0 = Scheduled, then when the alarm goes off, it changes to 1= Fired, and then when the user dismisses the alarm it changes to 2 = Dismissed. Type: INTEGER
